summary: Two wealthy sisters, both heiresses to their family's cosmetics fortune, are given a wake-up call when a scandal and ensuing investigation strip them of their wealth.
cast: Hilary Duff|Haylie Duff|Maria Conchita Alonso|Anjelica Huston|Brent Spiner|Lukas Haas|Marcus Coloma|Ty Hodges|Reagan Dale Neis|Obba Babatundé|Henry Cho|Misti Traya|Christina R. title: Material Girls
